layout.title: Categories - Columns Layout
layout.message: Displays a list of categories in columns layout

field.name: id
field.label: Category
field.description: Choose the category which you want to list it's sub categories

field.name: category_ids
field.label: Categories
field.description: Select categories which you want to display events from. If no categories selected, events from all categories will be displayed

field.name: exclude_category_ids
field.label: Exclude Categories
field.description: Select categories which you want to exclude events from

field.name: number_columns
field.label: Number Columns
field.description: Enter Number Columns which will be used to display categories

field.name: intro_text
field.label: Intro Text
field.description: If you enter some text here, it will be displayed above list of categories
